Data Visualization
View Process: More testing
The goal of this project was to gather data from the user, then use that data to display that data in the most intuitive way possible, in this case with interesting statistics and graphs. The site tests the user's ability to estimate a second by having him/her press the spacebar after he/she thinks that a second has psased. After thirty seconds, a page filled with charts is presented to the user.
Typography
View Process: More testing
The purpose of this project was to create a functional redesign of the popular desktop game Minesweeper. The original design is very dated, yet the game is almost solely played in that format which consists of beveled gray tiles. This project aimed at creating a flat and clean rendition, using colors that were easy on the eyes.
Minesweeper
View Process: More testing
The purpose of this project was to create a functional redesign of the popular desktop game Minesweeper. The original design is very dated, yet the game is almost solely played in that format which consists of beveled gray tiles. This project aimed at creating a flat and clean rendition, using colors that were easy on the eyes.
Tictactics
View Process: More testing
The goal of this project was to gather data from the user, then use that data to display that data in the most intuitive way possible, in this case with interesting statistics and graphs. The site tests the user's ability to estimate a second by having him/her press the spacebar after he/she thinks that a second has psased. After thirty seconds, a page filled with charts is presented to the user.
